PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07872019-06-16PS,  CBSA,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (IRPR) in order to (1) add the best interests of the non-detained child directly affected by an immigration detention decision to the existing list of considerations outlined in section 248 of the IRPR; and (2) codify what factors, at a minimum, must be considered in determining a child's best interests each and every time a detention decision is made that affects a child.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0213 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (IRPR) in order to (1) add the best interests of the non-detained child directly affected by an immigration detention decision to the existing list of considerations outlined in section 248 of the IRPR; and (2) codify what factors, at a minimum, must be considered in determining a child's best interests each and every time a detention decision is made that affects a child.
